languages.text: {n}Дознаватель поднимает брови.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, Вольному Торговцу по силам оспаривать власть Инквизиции над своей душой, умом и деяниями. Астропатам и вокс-офицерам, даже на службе столь почитаемой особы, как ваша — едва ли".

{n}The Interrogator's eyebrows lift.{/n} "Lord Captain, a Rogue Trader may be in a position to challenge the Inquisition's authority over their soul, mind, and actions. But a Rogue Trader's Astropaths and vox officers? Hardly."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель поднимает брови.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, Вольному Торговцу по силам оспаривать власть Инквизиции над своей душой, умом и деяниями. Астропатам и вокс-офицерам, даже на службе столь почитаемой особы, как ваша — едва ли".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyebrows lift.{/n} "Lord Captain, a Rogue Trader may be in a position to challenge the Inquisition's authority over their soul, mind, and actions. But a Rogue Trader's Astropaths and vox-officers? Hardly."

{n}The Interrogator's eyebrows lift.{/n} "Lord Captain, a Rogue Trader may be in a position to challenge the Inquisition's authority over their soul, mind, and actions. But a Rogue Trader's Astropaths and vox-officers? Hardly."

{n}The Interrogator's eyebrows lift.{/n} "Lord Captain, a Rogue Trader may be in a position to challenge the Inquisition's authority over their soul, mind, and actions. But a Rogue Trader's Astropaths and vox-officers? Hardly."

{n}The Interrogator's eyebrows lift.{/n} "Lord Captain, a Rogue Trader may be in a position to challenge the Inquisition's authority over their soul, mind, and actions. But a Rogue Trader's Astropaths and vox officers? Hardly."

languages.text: {n}海因里希扬起了眉毛。{/n}“舰长大人，或许行商浪人确实有权力挑战审判庭的权威，质疑审讯官的灵魂、思想与行为。可行商浪人麾下的星语者与音阵军官有这个权力吗？恐怕没有。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyebrows lift.{/n} "Lord Captain, a Rogue Trader may be in a position to challenge the Inquisition's authority over their soul, mind, and actions. But a Rogue Trader's Astropaths and vox officers? Hardly."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希扬起了眉毛。{/n}“舰长大人，或许行商浪人确实有权力挑战审判庭的权威，质疑审讯官的灵魂、思想与行为。可行商浪人麾下的星语者与音阵军官有这个权力吗？恐怕没有。”

languages.text: {n}El interrogador levanta las cejas.{/n} «Lord Capitán, un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente puede tener la opción de desafiar la autoridad de la Inquisición sobre su alma, mente y actos, pero sus astrópatas y oficiales de vocos son otra historia».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyebrows lift.{/n} "Lord Captain, a Rogue Trader may be in a position to challenge the Inquisition's authority over their soul, mind, and actions. But a Rogue Trader's Astropaths and vox officers? Hardly."

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador levanta las cejas.{/n} «Lord Capitán, un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente puede tener la opción de desafiar la autoridad de la Inquisición sobre su alma, mente y actos, pero sus astrópatas y oficiales de vocos son otra historia».

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは目を見開く。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、自由開拓者は自らの魂、心、行動について異端審問庁の権威に異議を唱える立場にあるかもしれません。しかし、感応通信官やヴォクス担当者であれば？ほぼ無理です」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyebrows lift.{/n} "Lord Captain, a Rogue Trader may be in a position to challenge the Inquisition's authority over their soul, mind, and actions. But a Rogue Trader's Astropaths and vox officers? Hardly."

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは目を見開く。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、自由開拓者は自らの魂、心、行動について異端審問庁の権威に異議を唱える立場にあるかもしれません。しかし、感応通信官やヴォクス担当者であれば？ほぼ無理です」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hausse les sourcils.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} est peut-être en mesure de défier l'autorité de l'Inquisition lorsqu'il est question de son âme, de son esprit et de ses actes, mais en ce qui concerne ses astropathes et officiers-vox ? C'est moins sûr. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyebrows lift.{/n} "Lord Captain, a Rogue Trader may be in a position to challenge the Inquisition's authority over their soul, mind, and actions. But a Rogue Trader's Astropaths and vox officers? Hardly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hausse les sourcils.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} est peut-être en mesure de défier l'autorité de l'Inquisition lorsqu'il est question de son âme, de son esprit et de ses actes, mais en ce qui concerne ses astropathes et officiers-vox ? C'est moins sûr. »

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator hebt die Augenbrauen.{/n} "Lord Captain, {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} mag in der Position sein, die Autorität der Inquisition über Seele, Verstand und Handeln in Frage zu stellen. Aber über Astropathen und Vox-Offiziere? Wohl kaum."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyebrows lift.{/n} "Lord Captain, a Rogue Trader may be in a position to challenge the Inquisition's authority over their soul, mind, and actions. But a Rogue Trader's Astropaths and vox officers? Hardly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator hebt die Augenbrauen.{/n} "Lord Captain, {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} mag in der Position sein, die Autorität der Inquisition über Seele, Verstand und Handeln in Frage zu stellen. Aber über Astropathen und Vox-Offiziere? Wohl kaum."

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu'nun kaşları kalkıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, Hür Tacir; ruhu, zihni ve eylemleri konusunda Engizisyon'un otoritesine kafa tutabilecek konumda olabilir. Ya Hür Tacir'in Astropatları ile voks subayları? Onlar değil."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator's eyebrows lift.{/n} "Lord Captain, a Rogue Trader may be in a position to challenge the Inquisition's authority over their soul, mind, and actions. But a Rogue Trader's Astropaths and vox officers? Hardly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu'nun kaşları kalkıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, bir Hür Tacir, ruhu, zihni ve eylemleri konusunda Engizisyon'un otoritesine kafa tutabilecek bir konumda olabilir ama bir Hür Tacir'in Astropatları ve voks subayları? Onlar pek sayılmaz."
